sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
div
  // Tab Content Start
  v-tabs-items.tab-background.fill-height(v-model='tab')
    // Tweet Tab
    v-tab-item.fill-height(:key='1')
      v-overlay(v-if='isLoading')
        v-progress-circular(indeterminate='' color='primary' size='200' v-if='isLoading')
      tweet(v-if='!isLoading' v-bind:tweettext='tweetText' v-bind:tweet='tweet' v-on:tabchange='this.changeTab($event)' @toggle-filter='this.toggleFilter' v-bind:filters='filters')
    // Tweet Tab
    // Profile Tab
    v-tab-item.fill-height(:key='2')
      profile(v-if='!isLoading' v-bind:tweet='tweet')
    // Profile Tab
    // Link Tab
    v-tab-item.fill-height(:key='3')
      link(v-if='!isLoading')
    // Link Tab
    // Words Tab
    v-tab-item(:key='4')
      v-container
        h1 Words
    // Words Tab
    v-tab-item(:key='5')
      v-container
        h1 Media
    v-tab-item(:key='6')
      v-container
        h1 Summary
  // Tab Content End
  // Tab Button Start
  v-tabs(v-model='tab' icons-and-text='' style='position: fixed; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 100%' center-active='' centered='' grow='')
    v-tabs-slider
    v-tab(:key='1')
      | Tweet
      v-icon mdi-twitter
    v-tab(:key='2')
      | Profile
      v-icon mdi-account
    v-tab(:key='3')
      | Links
      v-icon mdi-link
    v-tab(:key='4')
      | Words
      v-icon mdi-cursor-text
    v-tab(:key='5')
      | Media
      v-icon mdi-image
    v-tab(:key='6')
      | Summary
      v-icon mdi-card-text-outline
  // Tab Button End
</template>

<script>
//Import components
import Tweet from "../components/analysis/tweet/Tweet";
import Profile from "../components/analysis/profile/Profile.vue";
import Link from "../components/analysis/link/Link";

//Import twitter API
import { Twitter } from "../services/Twitter";

export default {
  name: "Analysis",
  components: {
    Tweet,
    Profile,
    Link
  },
  data() {
    return {
      tab: null,
      tweet: null,
      tweetText: null,
      isLoading: false,
      filters: {
        url: true,
        hashtag: true
      },
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async fetch() {
      var twitter = new Twitter();

      //Load required data from backend
      this.isLoading = true;
      const { data } = await twitter.getTweet(this.$route.params.id);
      this.isLoading = false;

      //Set the data equal to the local variables
      this.tweet = data;
      this.tweetText = twitter.highlight(this.tweet, this.filters);
    },
    //Changes the active tab to a defined tab
    tabChange(tab) {
      this.tab = tab;
    },
    //Changes the active highlight filters
    toggleFilter(e) {
      var twitter = new Twitter();
      console.log(e);
      switch (e) {
        case "url":
          this.filters.url = !this.filters.url;
          this.tweetText = twitter.highlight(this.tweet, this.filters);
          break;
        case "hashtag":
          this.filters.hashtag = !this.filters.hashtag;
          this.tweetText = twitter.highlight(this.tweet, this.filters);
          break;
        default:
          console.error("Filter error has occurred");
      }
    },
  },
  created() {
    this.fetch();
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.tab-item-wrapper {
  /* vuetify sets the v-tabs__container height to 48px */

  margin-top: 100px;
  margin-bottom: 100px;
}
</style>
